verbs.description: suspects confess to [V: selling] [ARG1: 31 human heads body parts] [ARG2: to prominent personalities in kwara] the principal suspect confessed that abdulfatai kadri has brought to him 20 human skulls that he exhumed from the ilorin community central burial ground situated after eid praying ground in ilorin kwara state he further admitted that kadri usually brings in the human heads to him in batches of four six eight for safe keeping and usually collects them within a day or two and also informed him of the personalities in ilorin and others he usually supply the heads to the police statement read abdulfatai kadri kwara state ilorin azeez yakub nigeria police force kwara commander principal ahmed yahaya baba fawasi police investigation team ilorin nigeria azeez yakubu sahara reporters baba muri adeta zone adedoyin
